content: And I think 450 Park, which just closed, I think, in the past few weeks or past month is as good a proxy as any for what our capabilities are in this market to acquire I think 1 was exceptionally located commercial assets in all of New York City on 57th and Park, further expanding our Park Avenue presence at a basis, we found very attractive and then demonstrated our ability to capitalize that deal with 75% brand-new fresh equity in this market environment and closing acquisition loan with 1 of our relationship and corporate lenders on terms that were really pretty much dead on underwriting.
